# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

1. FONOFF STATES BOLIVIA WILL BE REPRESENTED BY CHARGE IN
WASHINGTON AT AUGUST 19 - 22 MEETING.


2. EMBASSY HAS CONSULTED WITH FONOFF FREQUENTLY RE THIS
WORKING GROUP AND STRESSED ITS IMPORTANCE. FONOFF, HOWEVER,
HAS GIVEN NO RPT NO INDICATION OF POSITION IT HAS DEVELOPED
FOR INITIAL MEETING.
STEDMAN
